title: Essential Health
cleaned_text: BSN, RN, HNB-BC, Certified Clinical Aromatherapist Denise Joswiak We passionately provide the highest quality aromatherapy education for healthcare sites, healthcare practitioners and individuals who wish to use essential oils safely and effectively — and we always have fun while doing it! Meet Our Founder Denise Joswiak Trusted by the Industry we work with healthcare leaders on aromatherapy program implementation and education Workshop Series This beautifully illustrated workshop focuses on three holistic, integrative health practices. Learn about each individually, and then explore the synergy of combining all three. Includes peer-reviewed research that validates their effectiveness. Workshop Series Workshop Series Add your email to our mailing list to get the latest updates.
